20110106010009.000|20110106010010.000|CC1|RECENT STORMS.

20110106010012.000|20110106010013.000|CC1|OUTAGE IN OVER A DECADE.

20110106010023.000|20110106010026.000|CC1|OUTAGES LAST NIGHT WE HAVE BEEN 
20110106010026.000|20110106010027.000|CC1|FLOODED WITH CALLS FROM OUR

20110106010031.000|20110106010032.000|CC1|NO LAND LINE.

20110106010035.000|20110106010038.000|CC1|OF VERIZON CUSTOMERS WHO SAY    
20110106010038.000|20110106010040.000|CC1|THEIR HOME PHONES ARE NOT
